title: How do you replace the right click > reload current page function?
body:
I currently track if the F5 key has been clicked and if the window.location.reload is a new function.But right click reload I haven't been able to find the function it is mapped to to replace it with my newReload function.

$(document).on("keydown", function(e) {
    if(e.keyCode === 116) { // f5 keycode is 116
        e.preventDefault();
        e.returnValue = false; // for IE
        newReload();
    }
});
window.location.reload = newReload;
